content.detailedDescription: My farther took these picture while working ln renovating the old house. anyways zoom up on them and you will see little lines or dots on the orbs.
content.summary: Multiple light reflecting orbs

content.detailedDescription:
Beginning 3 weeks ago, on the first tuesday in march 2015, i would drive my daughter home from dance at 630pm (she goes to dance every week,  this was the first time we noticed the light). i was travelling on shawsheen street in tewksbury heading toward billerica.  i noticed a bright light that looked really low over the tewksbury food mart. i showed my daughter. i thought nothing of it. brought her home, picked up my son for karate.I was returning home with him at 805pm, same street, same direction. the star had not moved from above the store. it was too low to be a star, but really bright. i thought it must be a helicopter. but it stayed perfectly still. i dismissed it. 

the next night, wednesday, i went to yoga and while driving home on foster road i saw exactly the same thing again.  when i got home i stood outide my car and watched this light. not moving. i went inside to get my husband and when we came out it was gone. he thought i was making it up.

this same scenario has occurred 3 weeks in a row. last night, wednesday,  march 18 i watched it until 915 from my picture window. it was a very clear night. all of a sudden it was just gone.Even my kids saw it. last night was the first night i felt very nervous about it. how is it staying so still and then just gone? i took a picture of it the previous night, march 17, 2015.
content.summary: White stationary light. looked like a bright, low star. did not move . seen around 7pm. gone by 915pm. observed for 3 consecutive tuesday and wednesday 's

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on palomar airport road in carlsbad, ca...Driving to my son's baseball game at 7:15pm and i observed a saucer-like object in the sky through the driver side window...North of my location.

fortunately, i had my dslr with me because of the baseball game, so i rolled my window down and took three pictures in rapid succession. 

my daughter and i both watched it until we were forced to proceed with traffic and it was gone. 

using occam's razor, i assumed it was a drone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dark, saucer-like object notice from my car.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from my home in kerrytown toward a pharmacy on s. industrial parkway. while driving down s. state street toward eisenhower parkway at roughly 10:25pm eastern, i noticed in my periphery to the west (looking left) a redish-orange circle above the roofs of the houses on the left side of the street just as i was approaching the traffic light at stimson street. at first i thought it might be a helicopter, since there is a good bit of that type of traffic to uofm hospital.

when i made it to the traffic light, it had just turned red, so i rolled my window down and tried to find the object and to listen to see if i could hear the normal loud medical chopper, but could not at that time nor hear anything related.  i turned left onto stimson toward industrial, and as i reached the light at the stimson & industrial intersection, i again spotted the object in the sky clearly beyond, but above the old kroger building, and it was now moving south.

i turned right onto industrial parkway, heading south toward eisenhower parkway, and continued to track the orb the whole way, again, with no sound from the object.  throughout this time, it was no longer a solid color but more of a plasma-type effect, transitioning from red to orange to yellow to white, and mixing in between.  it's aerial path also seemed to be a bit erratic at this point as it seemed to decend/acend in jagged movements.  at this point i was fumbling trying to get my phone to take a video or pictures, but was unable to do so due to driving in an attempt to stay with the object. 

as we approached woodbury gardens apartments, i lost sight of the orb due to a bit of traffic on the road requiring my attention.  i decided to turn left onto astor avenue heading west to see if i could relocate it.  i drove a short way down astor, until i came to woodbury park.  as i stopped, i spotted the orb to the north, just as it entered into the bottom of a very large, very dark triangle-shaped object that i hadn't seen prior to this. 

the triangle-shaped object's surface was extremely dark, such that i was able to make out any detail of the surface of it.  there were, however, 3 flashing white lights that followed a repeating sequence in the shape of a triangle.  

the lights were moving from the north toward the south, and seemed to be approximately 2-3 miles away.  i shut my car off at this point and exited the vehicle to look and again try to snap a photo or video.  i also noticed there were people walking in the neighborhood and i asked if they had seen the lights, which they hadn't until i pointed them out.

the large triangle-shaped object moved smoothly, continuously, with the lights continuing to flash in the same sequence across the sky from north to south at a brisk clip.  unfortunately, it was brisk enough to have moved beyond the large trees in woodbury park and prevent me from getting a photo.  

i glanced at the clock and it was now just after 10:31pm.  i attempted to drive to the south to see if i could find the large triangle-shaped object again, but was unsuccessful.  i stopped to jot down a quick drawing of a map of both object sightings and of the objects, and to give mufon a call at that time.  after returning home i checked playback of flight radar data for the time in question and no flights where in the vicinity at the time either.
content.summary: 2 ufos: pulsating orb  large triangle dark w pulsating lights, blocked stars behind

content.detailedDescription: My dog wanted to go out. when i opened the door she would not go off the porch. i tried to make her and when i looked up there were four huge lights equal distance from each other changing colors.  they were very pretty.I thought it was plane's but there was no sound and the lights did not move from their positions. the distance between them stayed the same. there was a slight curve when it flew by the house.  there were a lot of stars out but as this thing moved very slowly it blocked out the stars and we could see it was huge.  my husband said it had to be miles long but it was so clear.  we watched it until it was out of sight.  i tried to take a picture with my i-phone but it just looks dark.  it blocked out all the stars so something was there.  my dog ran in the house and so did we.  it seemed like it was floating very slowly.  it went in the direction of the savanna river site.  we were not going to report this.  i never believed in aliens coming here but i do know our military hides what they have.
content.summary: 4 lights changing colors, equel distance from each other. huge craft floating siletly above tree line. culd not see stars till it passed.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: During the last three weeks in between hospital visit for pneumonia and heart problems i have had several sightings of our local object and out-of-towners. they have been seen firing beams of lights at each other amongn other things. my favorite of the little rov's (unless they have very small aliens in them), has approached me as close as 30 to 50 feet to warn me that there is danger in the area. i have made friends with the ones who where here when i arrived in the area 25 years ago. these are  apparently remote controlled vehichels unless the occupants are really small. they are the size of a basketball. they tend to blink at me when they think i am in danger. the larger objects tend to do this also so i take their word for it and head on inside when i see them blinking lights in my direction. i think it is nice that they care that much about me and hope they keep an eye on me amd our general area. here lately the violence between our good guys and the opposition has increased and is beginning to concern me. since my local contacts with my mufon people has stopped i am going back to reporting on line. leroy my ufo tracking dog has been tracking even when  it is cloudy, thick or thin and eeems to pick up the sound that the objects make regardless of whether than they can be see them. the build up violence is upsettlng me. why are they doing this? who are these other objects? who is going to protect us these advanced wheapons? this scares me to death. i hope that they come to a peaceful solution soon, i shudder to think of the alternative.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: In the last three weeks  i have had several sightings

content.detailedDescription: It was in the winter of 2012 when out walking i sat down by the river and took in the scene there is a beautiful waterfall and as i sat there i saw a saucer shaped craft... the ship fell out of the sky right beside the old north mill in belper derbyshire it was like meeting an old friend because i had seen a craft like it before... this time only the blue lights were lit and they danced around the perimeter of the ship like fireflys the craft stopped just before it hit the water and immediately darted up the river curling as it flew away... the craft was silver in colour and i ran into the river gardens to follow it i waited in the park for a while with my phone camera in hand however it was not seen again... i took a trip up belper lane and followed the road around to the right trying to catch a glimpse of the craft again but i could not see it...  in the woods i saw some orbs that were like the size of large beachballs however i couldnt get up close to them so i might be mistaken in thinking these were in any way significant... but the ufo i saw first was really cool it looked just like the same craft i saw in 2001 that visited me at my parents house...
content.summary: A saucer flew down beside belper mill and then soared up river

content.detailedDescription: Was observing night sky for relaxation noticed object because it was only visible object. at first thought was artificial satellite. it flickered randomly blue and white  lights. it remained in same location for the3-4 hours i observed it for  several days throughout the month. with unaided vision ufo appeared starlike. with binoculars it was diamond shaped. . i have seen a similar sighting in past and felt theyre none of my business but am distressed by this. i stopped observing it after a month.
content.summary: Ufo remained in same place each night observed, throughout the night.

content.detailedDescription: Was observing night sky for relaxation noticed object because it was only visible object. at first thought was artificial satellite. it flickered randomly blue and white  lights. it remained in same location for the3-4 hours i observed it for  several days throughout the month. with unaided vision ufo appeared starlike. with binoculars it was diamond shaped. . i have seen a similar sighting in past and felt theyre none of my business but am distressed by this. i stopped observing it after a month.
content.summary: Ufo remained in same place each night observed, throughout the night.

content.detailedDescription: I was shocked when i first noticed the ufo and the speed it was traveling across the sky. i was fascinated with it until i realized it was following my path home.I was so terrified and couldn't wait to get safely in my house.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: This vessel followed me to my home and hovered over my home. i was terrified!

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were sitting in my apartment watching tv at about 11pm. the apartment is on the third floor of a building with a large sliding-glass window leading to a balcony. my boyfriend noticed some strange-looking lights outside. i thought it was maybe a plane and wouldn't have given it a second thought. however, he went up to look and started exclaiming that what he was looking at was not a plane. i looked, and it appeared to be a disc-shaped craft with mostly white lights possibly hovering then traveling slowly and we lost view behind an apartment building. i got the impression that the disc was not spinning, but i don't know for sure.

we stepped outside on the balcony and my boyfriend pointed out a strange triangular craft with a red, green, and white light blinking at each point it flew overhead slow enough that we were able to observe it. then he noticed another, and another. they were flying in different directions across the sky and would eventually fly so far away we would be unable to see them.

during the sighting, i was in a state of disbelief. i was focused on trying to get a video, and my boyfriend was yelling that what we were seeing were ufos. i tried to be skeptical, and thought of what they could possibly be. i have seen satellites before, and these were too close to be satellites, plus they did not look like any satellites i had ever seen. they were not planes, as they were completely silent and flew in all different directions across the sky.

my boyfriend was excited to chase after them, while i was a bit scared. i was shaking as we ran outside and through the apartment complex. we would stop and see another blinking triangle flying above us. at one point while we stopped to film, a helicopter flew overhead, my boyfriend confirming my suggestion that it was military. at this point, i filmed possibly another slow-moving disc across the street. it looked the same or similar as the first one.

we split up and i went back to my apartment building to review footage. my boyfriend soon joined me. he said he ran into two guys while he was running around who sitting on their balcony who were seeing the same triangles flying around. i encouraged him to call the police to report the sighting because i thought, "there is no way we are the only people seeing these!" he called and we went inside because i was cold, and he continued to watch from the deck. i went out occasionally to look. i'd see the triangles fly over us on the balcony once in a while. at one point, i was sitting on the balcony by myself. i noticed one triangle going slowly across the sky, and it almost looked like it would "drop" something every few seconds, like a yellow beam or ball of light.

there was one very bright "star" present for the duration of the sighting that my boyfriend said was a ufo. i said it was probably a star or planet. by the time we stopped seeing the triangles, the star was mysteriously gone. it was a completely clear night.

my boyfriend received a call from a man from the faa. he described the sighting to him, and the man apparently said that he would be completely skeptical if it were not for someone in reed city reporting something similar 30 minutes earlier. i did not directly observe this, but my boyfriend swears he saw a silver disc speed off in the distance at incredible speeds. at about 12:30 am, my boyfriend stopped seeing triangles or other ufos. the last one i personally saw had more of a diamond shape with an additional small white light.

i'm a fan of the supernatural, and i love pondering what we don't know and what could be possible about our world. but throughout this experience, i was scared. to be honest, part of me felt that i didn't want to be seeing this. it was a "why me?" sort of feeling. i kept trying to be skeptical throughout this experience, and i looked up possible human explanations. the only possible ones i can find are drones (the videos i've been watching of them flying at night don't really look similar to what i saw, plus why so many?) or some kind of secret military devices (though why would they be flying them in clear sight?). 

if there was just one object, it would have been easier for me to dismiss as some sort of a drone, but the number of these things we saw made me doubt that explanation a lot. also, the faa person my boyfriend talked to said he knows the person who flew the military helicopter over, and he didn't report seeing anything. if they were drones, i think they would have just said they were drones. we both suspect some sort of cover-up. it was an overall spooky experience for me.
content.summary: Witnessed 15-20 triangular crafts traveling across the sky with red, green, and white blinking lights. also saw two larger disc-shaped craft and a mysterious

content.detailedDescription: I was being tormented by voices in my head that were claiming to be the friendly grey aliens when i turned and saw an image of an eye that seemed to be projected into my head or something then i got up and looked out of the window and was met with an amazing sight...There was a disc shaped craft hanging about a metre above my neighbors bungalow and about the same size as the building with lights spinning around the perimetre blue green and orange i have never come forward until now because i get regularly visited by aliens and it seemed to be better to keep quiet however the visits seem to have abated now so maybe it is time to come forward... the aliens have taken sperm samples from me whilst i am awake and i have seen an alien by my bed using some device that buzzes like a dentists drill... it scared me so i opened my eyes and tried to kick the alien in the head he moved back in time to avoid my blow but i noticed he had a kind of tattoo on his face a black line that was over his eye and down the side of his face it zig zaged...  there was a time previous to this that i was visited by about 4 or five aliens and they kind of milled around in my living room and they came up to me and kissed me and i cuddled them but somehow i reacted badly and attacked one of the aliens pushing my fingersb into his eye sockets and after this the visits stopped until i tried to get them to return and appologised profusely.  once i was taken to a ship and put on a table and one of the aliens extracted some of my facses and he squeezed it through his fingers whilst he looked a little puzzled i know this is because of my old addiction to heroin because it makes your poo hard when yu use the drug opium... mostly the aliens just hug and pet you like maybe you would with a dog as they want to make friends with us i think.. i think the purpose of the genetic experiments is to make humans that can lay eggs because live birth is strange on their planet.... i have met and had sex with women who have an enlarged vagina so they can lay eggs and i have also seen their experiments with dogs that have hands and kind of crawl about
content.summary: I was hearing voices in my head and they were tormenting me saying they are aliens then i rose from my bed and looked out of the window and there was a disc shaped craft about the size of the neighbors bungalow hanging in midair about a metre above house

content.detailedDescription:
I work on aircraft, and i arrived too early at sacramento airport for work, so i was at the gate on metro air park,between earhart drive and west elverta road, waiting outside my car. i was looking up at the moon and noticed a bright star moving erratically in the sky. it appeared very high up, higher than aircraft, and making 90% turns and circles. it moved from east to west stopped on a dime, then moved north to south.
it seemed to be shooting something solid out the front and sometimes the rear of the star like craft. it ejected objects about six times that i noticed. the only sound i heard was the crickets. i watched it until the sun came up and lost sight of it then. while i had my eye on the craft, other airplanes from the airport started taking off. the craft was very high in the sky.
it was pretty clear out, i could see the half moon and other stars, maybe a few wispy clouds in the sky. the temp was about 56 degrees and little to no wind. there is an air force base near by at fairfield
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 630 am saw a white, bright, star zig zaging around very high in the sky

content.detailedDescription: 3-17-15 belfry, ky (turkey creek ky). i was walking my dog at 3-4 am, i looked at the sky above the mountains behind my house and noticed something strange. i walked back in got binoculars and a small digital cam. at first i only saw several white lights either grouped together or as a whole object. i took about 7-8 pics and to my amazement some of the last pics were different colored orbes. 2- one blueish and the other greenish, a white orbe was coming towards but there were at least 5-6 smaller orbes the camera didn't pick up. after about 20-30 mins i looked outside again and to my shock and awe it was moving very slowly still, almost hovering above my front yard. it was and had remained very high up in the sky. no streetlights, cars, just me and my lil doggie. on the orbes pic you can see the tree branches kind of outlined underneath the orbes. the last pic was taken from my front porch and its the neon green light that is oblong in shape. every pic, even the first pics of the white lighted object, you can see the changes in shape. i couldn't believe i had pics like this! i've seen plenty of weird things in the sky but this is by far the most amazing!! since i was a lil girl i've always looked up skyward and will always do this. maybe one day i'll catch even better pics than this or video. it was very exciting. after i took the very last pic from the front porch i came in and messaged everyone i knew. i lost sight of it due to the fact that if there were some kind of being, it might have known i was watching it. so it was best to leave it alone, especially after the awesome pics i had already taken.
content.distance: 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.summary: 3-17-15 turkey creek, ky. walking my dog whom was oblivious around 3-4 am. looked toward the mountain, there's a tree between mine and the neighbors house. i walked back in, got binoculars and my small digital can. proceeded to take pics.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1969 or 1970 in white pine, tenn., about 8 pm,  when i was 9 years old, my friend and i saw a triangle shaped craft, as big as two city blocks, hovering over an impound yard. either taking something or leaving something. we also noticed two humanoid creatures in the field. they seemed either blue or grey in color. the craft was metallic gray and silent. the fence glowed white while the posts glowed blue around the impound yard.
when we got home, about 10 pm, our families told us they had been looking for us for one and one half hours. we don't remember what happened to the time.
the next day we went to see the impound yard to check it out, and the government had come in the night and removed the poles, fences, and all the cars. it was a vacant lot, it is still a vacant yard with grass, some 40 some years later. 
the impound lot was on zimmerman st, and so was the apartment we lived in.
nothing was ever built on the lot. is it too late for a soil sample to be taken?
i haven't talked to my friend in years, so i don't want to give his name.
content.summary: When witness and friend were 9 years old saw a large triangle craft hovering over impound yard either leaving or retrieving something

content.detailedDescription: 3-17-15 3-4 am, turkey creek ky. i noticed something unusual above the mountain behind my house. i even did a little test to see if it was moving using the very big tree between mine and the neighbors house. i first used the binoculars and saw a weird shaped all white lights object. when i decided to take pics, my camera isn't the greatest but it definitely got the pics i wanted and needed. no street lights, no sound, it seemed to hover. you can see the tree branches in the pics with the orbes. i actually was shocked when i saw the orbes cause you couldn't with the naked eye. after about 20-30 mins i looked outside to see if the ufo was still there, and it was just now it was very high in the sky above my front yard. that's the last pic i took, with the neon green oblong shaped craft. i've seen things in the sky my whole life but nothing like this. ever since i was a little girl i always look up, can't help it. always have and always will. it was just me and my chihuahua (poopie), no cars, nothing. i thought wow i've seen things but this tops them all. hopefully one day, i'll be able to get more photos a bit closer. the thing was far away the whole time but i sure saw it. it was an awesome experience and i know we're not alone in this vast universe. i'm not talking about microorganisms, i'm talking bout lifeforms similar to human beings!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Walking dog at 3-4am, noticed something strange, got the binoculars and digital cam.The orbes were some of the last pics, no street lights, no sound. i hope you see all the pics cause its just showing 3 different colored lights, there were at least 5-6.

content.detailedDescription: After my event this weekend on 3-14-15 i have been looking in the same place to just check and last night at 9:10pm i looked out of my window and saw the object had come back and went outside and took a few photos and a video and came back in to look at them. after viewing them i saw that it was back and looked back out and saw it was till there so i made a few more pictures and videos checking off and on as it was cold out and then i saw i could film from my bathroom window and took an almost 4 min video and a few more pictures bracing my camera on the window to reduce shake or camera motion. i made a last check at about 10 pm and saw it was no longer there and took one last video to have as a comparison of what it looks like with out a ufo to show no towers or any other structures on the top of the skyscrapers could cause this.
content.summary: Saw small white orb over the top of a skyscraper in same place as it was on 3-14-15

content.detailedDescription:
I saw the object out of the corner of my eye and when  
i looked up and out the window i saw the three lights hovering over  
our vehicle. as i was watching it,  i realized it was triangular it has
i could clearly see three lights an each tip of the shape. it was so  
low and seemed to be raising up.  shortly after,  we spotted a plane  
coming up on it, and it literally dissapeared.  we got to our  
destination about four miles away,  and our friend stated he saw the  
exact same thing about 30 minutes prior.
content.summary: Triangular craft with 3 lights hovered over vehicle, ascended, disappearted.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back deck eating dinner when i looked to the south and saw a odd shape  in the sky.As it got closer i saw that it was a round 4ft. gray like disc. i knew right away it was a ufo. it had a dark ring on the outside edge but the center was like it blended with the clouds but a little darker. it flew over head and disapeared to the north it took about 20 seconds with no sound.I know what i had just witnessed. i ran into the house and yelled to my wife i just saw a ufo. and then i called my two brothers then i got on the computer to if anyone else witnessed the sighting. and one other person did.
content.summary: Back deck loo my head north no soundking south saw under cloud line 4ft. disc shaped stealth object flew over

content.detailedDescription: Got a phone call from a friend in hohenwald that he spotted a ufo over his property headed west. a hovering orb. i went outside and i saw it as well over the treeline. bright orange/reddish just hovering 20 degrees above the horizon south west of hohenwald tn, just over the woods. distance was hard to judge as it was dark. called my family who live southwest of hohewald in the woods, they also were able to see the ufo hovering in the sky northerly from their position. have poor video footage and will share online shortly. object hovered there for appr. 45 minutes, changing position slightly. out of nowhere a second orb that was smaller and bright white materializes and swoops up from beneath treeline on the horizon, up towards the other orb, around it but not touching it at all, then back down under the observable shadow of the treeline and is lost from visual. primary orb hovers floating slowly northwest until it goes beyond view from horizon. multiple witnesses from three different locations around hohenwald tn. not the first sighting in this area but one of the more documented ones. my friend got in his truck to chase the ufo but i could not join him, and haven't heard any new info from him since the incident.
content.summary: Bright orb hovering over treeline, moving slightly laterally, varying brightness/color. second orb (smaller) bright white and fast moving

content.detailedDescription: My son and i was watching tv and periodically going outside to see if we could see the northern lights. my son seen what looked like a star at first. he noticed that it was blinking and changing different colors. i seen it with naked eye and it didn't look like a normal star so i grab the binoculars and i could the lights clearly it had a constant clear light on and then red, green and blue would run in sequence up and down. the clear light sometimes give a bright flash,but mainly constant. it was perfectly clear last night. i called the sheriff's department to send a deputy over to witness it. i kept a constant eye on it while waiting for the deputy to get here. it slowly started to move to south west to more south direction. there was a tree line it was over and it was about 30 minutes before the deputy got here. the stars that was in the sky around it was still place. my son and i are military aircraft enthusiast and also studied astronomy to know the difference of what's in the sky. we both have telescopes and observe often. we know what we saw is not a normal light formation of aircraft and the color of the lights on this object was were more crisp. i just wanted to report what we saw. it happen on 3/17/15 approx 12:08 am.
content.summary: My son seen it first and i got binoculars and seen it hovering. lights were up and down i called sheriff's dept and it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i, were traveling south three encounters and one second person account.
traveling south along route 1 in mexico we come into a town called tux pan, mex. my friend and i are avid stargazers so we look up a lot into the night sky. so my friend looks up into the starry sky and sees this object about 500- to 1000ft above use to the right that he has seen before in california. so, i stop the car and get out to look. sure as s**t its an object with no navigable lights to make out.I know this because i have studied aviation and went to college for aviation. it's a fiery red orb that hovers for a minute then proceeds very slowly toward the gulf of mexico. this happen twice.
the third firsthand account, was in tehucan,mx. in a little barrio northeast of the city. 
us and some friends where standing outside a friends house drinking coffee and talking. when my friend and i see this black orb slowly moving northwest across the neighborhood to or 12"o`clock. it's moving really slow and we can't believe our eyes. the area around the orb seems to give of waves of heat or something that obscures the foreground sky around it.
we ask our friends if they see it and they see yeah, there around here all the time. 
the first to sightings we were like whet the hell is that. quickly assessing that it's not any man made aircraft. 
the third we were in shock. as it disappeared behind a row of shanty homes on a hill. still can figure out where that thing vanished too.
the first to sightings they disspear in the the distance as to fly away. time seem to be frozen becuase they were moving slow but it didn't take long for them to fly away. the first two sightings flow over the gulf of mexico.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Friend and i wher driving through tuxpan at night, and looked up to see this red orb following the car.On two ocassions. third third was in tehucan,mx. where a black orb procedd slowly over a neighborhood we were in. same slowl movement but with the red

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving for work at my usual early hour (about 5:25am). i live well away from city lights so at that hour everything is black. i made my usual right turn toward the highway when i noticed what i initially thought was a light aircraft moving well above the road and in a northerly direction. i am an aircraft enthusiast and when the mke active is 7r, it is not unusual to see inbound traffic out of the southwest/west. this was not an airliner although i thought it might be a bizjet headed for crites. the unknown had only three (3) white lights arranged in a triangle. absolutely no nav lights or blinking strobes. my route has me turning right and then up a slight grade that gives you a good view (approx. 20 miles) of the airspace north to waukesha. in the 20-30 seconds that the object was out of my sight, it had vanished. the usual array of tv news choppers can be seen easily at the same distance if they are out and about. due to the darkness, no physical form was visible.
content.summary: Three white lights in a triangular array moving above roadway.

content.detailedDescription: I came out to about 5 foot from my wooden 6 foot fence around 940 pm to take my dog out to go to the restroom. i was watching a group of stars just east of orions belt when an object came from south to north. it was gun metal dark grey with a round nose. i could see the rivit lines make a circle and another rivit line ran drown from it. as the object was passing i saw at least 4 to 6 dark tinted windows in a round fuselage. as the object continued, i saw the tail back of the object that was shaped like a austi martin frontgrill. the tail grill had vertical lines.I could see 2 slanted round shaped objects that ran vertical and above the object itself. as the craft was leaving my field of view, i could see the object have the round 2 piece "beem or landing foot" and the craft gave me a slender, long body that widned going to the front of the craft. the craft had no markings. the craft made no sound. the windows were a darker tint than the test of the craft.
content.summary: The object came thur the sky with no lights or sound

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv an seen out the window unusual brite lights.Me and my cousin went outside and watched this thing slowly float through the air low and dead quiet three steady white lights on it ,one on tip two on the wings and a dimmer red light in the middle of it on bottom could see the shape against the stars and we both agreed on it being a triangle
content.summary: Seen twice on two different nights same thing each night

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my deck smoking and looking directly west at the sky.  i noticed around eight separate contrails from different objects but could not see the objects and thought to my self that it was very strange because planes cannot fly that close together or they would crash into each other.  then after about a minute i saw a low plane flying under the trails. it was very far under the trails so i knew it had not generated them.  then that plane flew away and i saw one of the trails go completely straight up in the air. i thought to myself that cannot be a plane because it was going straight up like a roller coaster would do.  i ran in the kitchen and got my phone and started taking pictures. it was completely vertical. then after about a minute or two of going straight up it moved toward my house coming south east.  i watched it as it went over my house and the object in front of the trails was gold and glowing and oval/egg shaped. it did not look like a plane and i was directly under it. i kept taking pictures. it was moving fairly slow. then it left my viewing site.  very strange incident. i looked at the pictures and blew them up on my phone and as i thought it was not a plane. i kept going over it in my head and just kept thinking how it went completely vertical and straight up in the air before it turned and went over my house. the other odd feature was the bright gold color.
content.summary: Gold round/oval/egg shaped. with trails went vertical in air.

content.detailedDescription:
On may 10th, 2014 my girlfriend, her daugter  and i invited a few friends over for a bonfire.  about 10:45 that night we all saw something pretty incredible.  kyle noticed it first and got everyone's attention. my buddy and his girlfriend saw it next. when my girlfriend and i spotted it i started to record it on my iphone.

we saw a craft with no clear edges or sides and it seemed to emanate ever changing light from its entirety thereby obscuring it's surface. it appeared to be 20-50 foot in length although its exact distance from me was not easy to judge so i couldn't say to any certainty its size or shape. it appeared to be in our neighborhood and hovering over the rooftops and a height of no more than a few hundred feet. i would say it was about 200-400 feet away from where we were all standing in our back yard. it would hover then move slowly then quickly, alternating between the three. when i say quickly i mean instantaneously. i would estimate that from the time we first saw it until it became stationary it traveled a couple thousand feet. this all took about 30 seconds. it then sat there for about 15 seconds at which point it started pulsing, let out a very soft but weird kind of electrical whine and then flew almost directly away from us towards the southern horizon at extremely high speed, then abruptly made an almost right angle turn to a course of almost straight up and at an unbelievably high rate of speed......All while staying directly in the center of our field of view. 

during this whole time the object didn't make a sound. not even the sound of air rushing over it as it whipped by us!!! it did let out a strange electrical noise, like it was charging up to take off and that's exactly what it did. 6 of us watched it and i have the whole thing on video. that's another oddity, what we saw with out eyes appeared maybe 30 foot across but it hardly showed up on the video, like it what cloaking itself or messing with the camera. 

i can't say what it is that i saw with any certainty but, i believe that it was not a plane, helicopter, rocket, jet, ballon, lantern or anything like weather phenomenon. it seemed to move intelligently and as weird as this sounds, it seemed biological in the nature of its movements and lighting.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 6 of us watched a silent large bright object hover over us 2mins the shot to space!

content.detailedDescription:
In the early 90's the witness and his friend were going out to meet a friend just off 1-80, buy the great salt lake.They observed a fire off the south side of the road. when they moved closer, the object lifted off the ground and began to move towards their car.
the object turned into a sphere as it moved , broke into 2 object and brightened.

the objects passed 3 feet away from the car and then shot straight up into the the upper atmosphere until it was unseen.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sighting at great salt lake

content.detailedDescription:
Date for event is between 2009 - 2011. time is aprox between 20:00-21:00 (stockholm time).

went for a walk along the sdra lnggatan in mlilla, when i suddenly at the intersection with ljunggatan saw something black triangular about 20 meters long with three green lights on the short side "stern" (figure 1), glide silently by, just a little bit of birch trees nearby, over the road, just above me and the rental house on the other side. 

the speed was quite slow, first thought it was an airplane or glider, but it was not consistent with the shape. came from the north and continued south. the entire sighting lasted about 40 seconds. the weather was calm.
content.summary: Ufo flies over treetops directly over me
